title: AIR Surf Rack - The Original Adjustable Surfboard Wall Rack Hanger - for Minimalist Style Floating Vertical Mount Storage & Display
features: The 21st Century Surfboard Rack that will rock your wall.
IDEAL FOR STORAGE AND DISPLAY: Can fit any standard surfboard with two parallel fins; Twins, Thrusters and Quads. Requires NO overhead lifting.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN - Floating on AIR: The board hangs vertical and flush against the wall. Telescoping adjustable arms enable the rack to hide behind the board - creating a super clean look and a floating effect.
BUILT TO LAST: Super durable and can hold a board up to 22 LBS / 10 KGS.
FULL WARRANTY: 30 day 100% satisfaction guaranteed along with 1 Year Manufacturer’s Warranty.
description: The AIR Surf Rack is now available on Amazon. Features: -Adjustable telescoping arms, which enable the rack to remain concealed behind the board. -Made of reinforced polymer compounds and silicone components. -Can hold a max weight of 22LBS / 10KGS. -Fits any standard surfboard, fish board, shortboard or longboards with two parallel fins: Twins, Thrusters, Quads and five-fin set ups. *Not compatible with single-fin surfboards. -Easy mount and dismount off the wall; Requires no overhead lifting.-Quick and easy installation (4 screws). -Top harness with silicone bands and transparent hooks for maximum security and support.-Kit includes all the necessary accessories, including screws and anchors for both concrete or dry walls.-1 Year manufacturer’s warranty and 100% satisfaction guaranteed with a 30 day full return. ---- GO Vertical! ----
